title: Klebsiella pneumoniae alters zebrafish circadian rhythm via inflammatory pathways and is dependent on light cues
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Hui Ding, Xiao-chun Chen, Lin Wan, Ying-ying Zhang, Xiao-hong Rui, Tian He, Jun Liu, Zhong-bo Shang
